documents.document:
poem

I love you hunny, its for real. I'm your number 1, i think about you night and day, your hugs and kisses are delight, you are always there to show you care; you act real strong without a fear, you bring a sparkle to my eyes, but with your looks and your talent that's no surprise, in your arms i feel safe and secure, being away from you should be against the law! you cheer me up when i'm feeling down; to me you are the sweetest guy in town.

When i'm with you its seems to me, you and me together we're meant to be, when i look in your eyes i no its true, it wouldnt live without out you, if there was a day where we had to part, i would want you to know you are in my heart. if there was a day i had to say goodbye, i could tell you i loved you with out a lie, i have 1 last thing to say, you are my heart and thats where you stay!

You are my heart, you are my desire, i want you more then rain on fire. I need you to make me strong; you're the only one who right my wrongs i try my hardest to make you smile, even though it may take a while i'm not alive until i'm with you. I hope you feel like this too, you are my world dont go away, i love you more than words can say!

I gess what i'm trying to say is .... i really do love you i love you more than you will ever know, i love you so much - more than words can say, you are my one and only, i just know its going to stay this way, i love you forever babe.

poem

Girl: Do i ever cross ur mind

Boy: No

Girl: Do you like me?

Boy: Not really

Girl: Do you want me?

Boy: No

Girl: Would you cry if I left?

Boy: No

Girl: Would you live for me?

Boy: No

Girl: Would you do anything for me?

Boy: No

Girl: Choose--me or ur life

Boy: my life

The girl runs away in shock and pain and the boy runs after her and says...

The reason you never cross my mind is because you're always on my mind.

The reason why I don't like you is because I love you.

The reason I don't want you is because I need you.

The reason I wouldn't cry if you left is because I would die if you left.

The reason I wouldn't live for you is because I would die for you.

The reason why I'm not willing to do anything for you is because I would do everything for you.

The reason I chose my life is because you ARE my life.

Angel of winter

Love is like winter it can get so cold you can't hear because of all your fear your so trapped from all the fear that you want to get out from under neath this pierced heart.
Because he never loved you and you never loved him and all you wanted to say was i always loved you dear. And i can no longer be hear i don't want you any more dear. Because i'm so cold you locked me up and you never wanted me to part because all you wanted was my soal and my heart.
I ran away and you came after me you locked me up once again and through away the key you stabbed me and said it was my fault and now i'm cold and i feel like winter.
You killed me babe and you said i really loved you,all you wanted was me to be dead and my last words to you are i really did love you to but now i will never love again. You killed me babe and i have no soal or heart and i will never have kids i wanted a baby girl and i wanted to get married but now im no girl im an angle of winter and im not your baby girl.

The ghost of summer

I once knew a girl she was in my life then she turned around and stabbed me with a knife. She usto be a good friend of mine and we treated each other right. One day she turned around and said she wanted me dead. I wish my mum was here she would hold me and say its all right, but she isnt and i feel that i have no life. My friend picked up that knife and she stabbed me twice, I am gorn now i have no life, I see that girl I am a ghost and i haunt her. I go as i please and i do what i want so i went to her house and I picked up a knife and i went over to her and I stabbed her twice. She woke up and looked at me then she relised she was dead like me, she came with me and we relised we were free. I'm not a woman I'm not even a girl i'm a ghost and my name is summer I am free. I come back to life every summer and i come back to earth. I am a girl I have a boyfriend, we have a little girl and she is special she has a full life. My boyfriend understands i must go now but i will be back soon, i must say good bye and i must go to sleep goodnite I love you.

guy's just dont get it

Sometimes i feel all alone that i have no one to call my own. I just sit here in this empty room crying and crying because i'm all alone. I wish i could stab myself sometimes because no one wants me, and they don't even want to call me when i'm alone. I'm at home again holding a picture of friendly faces that i love and i hope to see again. One day this guy said he loved me and i said i didn't love him, he would always say that he wanted me in bed and that he wanted to kiss me. But i don't feel anything for him i don't want anything to do with him. I told him i was a vergin and he keeps saying he is to but i no he isnt and he keeps asking me out, i say no and i'm not interested i dont want a relationship with you. Im moving soon i hope that i find someone to call my own and someone i can trust and someone that just wants me for who i am and not just for sex. I just want to be happy so if this guy gets what i'm saying he would leave me alone and he would move on, he would find someone else to call his own. So what i'm telling you is i'm just a girl and i'm no woman i'm just a lolney girl in this life. And i'm living day to day with memories all alone so if you could please just leave me alone.

You come to me with your scars on your wrist
You tell me this will be the last night feeling like this

I didn't want you to see me cry, I'm fine
But I know it's a lie

This is the last night you'll spend alone
Look me in the eyes so I know you know
I'm everywhere you want me to be
The last night you'll spend alone
I'll wrap you in my arms and I won't let go
I'm everything you need me to be

I'm everywhere you want me to be

I won't let you say goodbye
